Introduction

Heo Min-seon (허민선), best known by the stage name Way (웨이), is a South Korean singer, streamer, and YouTuber. She is best known as a member of the of the South Korean girl group Crayon Pop, along with their sub-unit, Choa & Way (Strawberry Milk) under Chrome Entertainment.

Before Way's debut as a member of Crayon Pop, she debuted in November 2011 as a member of the South Korean rock band, N.Dolphin. However, she left the band to join Crayon Pop after being given a second chance by Chrome Entertainment as she declined the first time. Her group Crayon Pop then disbanded in 2017. Her group Crayon Pop is now on hiatus. After Crayon Pop's hiatus, she created a YouTube channel called Wayland.
